name: Yara
author: Nils Kuhnert, CERT-Bund; Fabien Bloume, StrangeBee
description: Check files against YARA rules, either from local filesystem or from one or multiple GitHub repositories. NOTE: Performance & execution time may be much longer according to the number of rules checked.

configurationItems.name: github_urls
configurationItems.description: GitHub URLs to get rules from. Expected format: https://github.com/owner/repo/tree/main or https://github.com/owner/repo/tree/main/subdir

configurationItems.name: github_token
configurationItems.description: PAT (recommended) in case of private repository or high frequency of pulls/executions
